Common.AgentTitle.Common.Text:
Personal Real Estate Corporation
Executive Vice President

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 5301 Joyce Street, Vancouver, BC (the “Property“) represents a 6,600 SF corner property, designated for up to 12-storey mixed-use development, well situated in the heart of the Joyce-Collingwood Station Precinct, one of Vancouver’s most established neighbourhoods. The Property is ideally situated at the southwest corner of Euclid Avenue and Joyce Street, just 270 meters (3 minute walk) to the Joyce-Collingwood transit hub and commercial arterial. In addition to the Property’s 6,600 SF site, there is additional opportunity to acquire the neighbouring properties to expand the site size to up to 12,969 SF, for approximately 132’ of frontage along Joyce Street. Vacancy Status - 5301 Joyce Street (currently tenanted); 5303 Joyce Street (Available for lease).

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR SALE | MIXED-USE DEVELOPMENT SITE IN JOYCE-COLLINGWOOD STATION PRECINCT

Prominently located in one of Vancouver's trendiest areas, the sites offer developers an exclusive opportunity to play a leading role in the ever-evolving transformation of the neighbourhood.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Presenting a truly unique, once in a lifetime opportunity to build an iconic master-planned community in one of Vancouver’s most desirable and prominent neighbourhoods. Langara Estates One sits on a sizable 5.63 acre site and offers prospective purchasers the opportunity to build a mix of new multi-family buildings of varying heights on the edge of Langara Golf Course. This ideal location will provide world-class unobstructed views and a quiet residential feel rarely found within large-scale residential developments, with excellent potential to capture new condo pricing commensurate with this prestigious West Side offering.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: LANGARA ESTATES ONE | CREATE AN ICONIC DEVELOPMENT IN THE HEART OF VANCOUVER

Common.AgentTitle.Common.Text:
Personal Real Estate Corporation
Executive Vice President

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The offering provides an unprecedented opportunity to acquire a large-scale, world-class redevelopment site in the heart of Vancouver’s prestigious West Side. The property is currently improved with 42 duplex-style townhomes on a sprawling 5.63 acres, bordered by Langara Golf Course and Cambie Street. The Langara/49th Avenue Canada Line Station is just a stone’s throw away from this exceptional location, offering convenient access to both Downtown Vancouver and Vancouver International Airport.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: LANGARA ESTATES ONE | CREATE AN ICONIC DEVELOPMENT IN THE HEART OF VANCOUVER

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE Limited is pleased to offer for sale a future purpose built mixed-use rental development site with holding income.  The Subject Property is conveniently located next to the intersection of Oak Street and West 49th Avenue in Vancouver’s west-side. Under the policies of the Cambie Corridor Plan, the subject property is designated “mixed use with rental housing” allowing for new densities of up to 3.0 or 4.0 FSR depending on site assembly and affordable housing requirements.  With residential rental vacancies at historical lows throughout Metro Vancouver, this offering represents an opportunity to secure a strategic parcel for future rental development in an excellent location.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR SALE | DEVELOPMENT SITE WITH HOLDING INCOME

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Located just 200 meters away from Marine Gateway, 8655 Cambie Street is a prime redevelopment opportunity under the Intensive Employment designation within the Marpole Community Plan. Marine Gateway is an award-winning transit-oriented urban retail and entertainment centre featuring Cineplex Cinemas, T&T Supermarket, Steve Nash Fitness World, Winners, among many others. This rapidly growing commercial and residential core has more than 2,000 newly developed residential units, as well as, future plans in place to expand the retail amenities nearby. The area surrounding Marine Gateway is set to undergo a major revitalization and 8655 Cambie Street represents are rare opportunity to be a part of this transformation.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR SALE | INTENSIVE EMPLOYMENT REDEVELOPMENT OPPORTUNITY

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE Limited is pleased to offer for sale a prime west-side Vancouver townhome development site, consisting of four large single-family lots, on a full city block. Under the guidelines and policies of the Cambie Corridor Phase 3 Area Plan, this land assembly can be rezoned to permit an overall density of up to 1.2 FSR on the site for townhome development, subject to the guidelines and policies of the Cambie Plan.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: RARE 1.06 ACRE WEST-SIDE VANCOUVER TOWNHOME DEVELOPMENT SITE

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE Limited is pleased to offer for sale a prime west-side Vancouver townhome development site, consisting of four large single-family lots, on a full city block. Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Located just 200 meters away from Marine Gateway, 8690 Ash Street is a prime redevelopment opportunity under the Intensive Employment designation within the Marpole Community Plan. Marine Gateway is an award-winning transit-oriented urban retail and entertainment centre featuring Cineplex Cinemas, T&T Supermarket, Steve Nash Fitness World, Winners, among many others. This rapidly growing commercial and residential core has more than 2,000 newly developed residential units, as well as, future plans in place to expand the retail amenities nearby. The area surrounding Marine Gateway is set to undergo a major revitalization and 8690 Ash Street presents a rare opportunity to be a part of this transformation.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR SALE | 8690 ASH STREET VANCOUVER, BC

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located at the corner of Oak Street and West 64th Avenue
Located at the corner of Oak Street and West 64th Avenue

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE Limited is pleased to present the unique opportunity to acquire 8029-8225 Oak Street (“the Site”), an exceptionally well-located corner residential redevelopment site within walking distance of the Marine Drive SkyTrain Station. With 600 feet of frontage along Oak Street, the Site is prominently situated within the heart of the Marpole neighbourhood within Vancouver West. Centrally located between downtown Vancouver and the Vancouver Airport (YVR), the Site offers excellent accessibility throughout Metro Vancouver. The Site is only a 15-minute walk from the Canada Line Skytrain, and Oak Street is a major North-South connector, linking the Fairview community in the North and the Oak Street Bridge in the South leading to Richmond. This development opportunity offers the potential to build multi-family residential within a premium, sought-after location in Vancouver West, with the potential to yield a maximum of 170,975 square feet (up to 2.50x FSR). The Site is strategically structured as two assemblies, offering a potential purchaser flexibility as well as the opportunity to purchase the shares of the bare trust nominee corporations. The site is currently improved with 12 single-family homes, providing stable holding income during the redevelopment process.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR SALE | WEST SIDE REDEVELOPMENT SITE
